title: Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection Manager v2.82 .rdg support
author: user9234739427
body_snippet:
Microsoft updated RDCMAN and changed something about how .rdg files are saved and now mRemoteNG does not open .rdg files anymore.

## Expected Behavior
.rdg files open in the Connections panel when going to File - Import - Import From File

## Current Behavior

Error message pops up saying "An error occurred while importing the file"

## Possible Solution
not sure

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Download new version of RDCMan 2.82 from https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sysintern...

iterations.description: Add support for importing connections from Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection Manager v2.82 .rdg files.

comments.author: pjamesburwell
comments.snippet: A simple explanation on how to export to the right format is all that is needed here @mremoteng-ci

@user9234739427 @pjamesburwell I had a look through the source code and found the cause of the issue here: https://github.com/brucetp/mRemoteNG/blob/develop/mRemoteV1/Config/Serializers/MiscSerializers/RemoteDesktopConnectionManagerDeserializer.cs#L52-L58

All I had to do for the import to complete successfully was to change the value of the `ProgramVersion` variable in my `.rdg` file from `2.83` to `2.7` so it can pass the hard-coded version check.
